short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon checks if Amazon delivers to your country, from the search page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon checks if Amazon delivers to your country, from the search page.

When the result page is loaded, a yellow border will appear around each result.
The border will turn green when delivery is confirmed, turn red if delivery is impossible, and stay yellow if no information is available.

You need to be logged into Amazon and have a default shipping address saved in order for this to work.

In the settings, you can choose a black-and-white color scheme instead of colors.
